entry.title: Thursday night: A few clouds. Low minus 13.
entry.summary: A few clouds. Fog patches developing overnight. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 13. Wind chill minus 8 this evening and minus 19 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Thursday 30 March 2023

entry.title: Friday: Mainly sunny. High plus 3.
entry.summary: Mainly sunny. Fog patches dissipating in the morning. Wind becoming south 20 km/h gusting to 40 near noon. High plus 3. Wind chill minus 19 in the morning. UV index 4 or moderate. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Thursday 30 March 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Clear. Low minus 5.
